ygData.subject: New to List
ygData.msgSnippet: This may have been recieved twice, but the list has not recognized my mail ID yet. :( Hello all. I play a 4th (almost 5th) level Shadow Knight Troll. I plan on
ygData.messageBody:
This may have been recieved twice, but the list has not
recognized my mail ID yet. :(


Hello all.
I play a 4th (almost 5th) level Shadow Knight Troll. I
plan on investing quite a bit in this character, but
want to know how to get food/water/weapons etc.
from "good" cities. The underground in Freeport doesn't
have any food vendors that I know of, nor does the Shady
Swashbuckler in the N.Ro tunnel to East Commons.
In Neriak I am "looks at you dubiously" but not KOS, and
I think I am KOS in Ogre-ville (I chose to worship Cazic
Thule). So that limits me to Grobb, RO and Commons, and
Neriak.
I won't even think of going to Faydwer for a long time.
Does the NPC merchant tents in South RO sell to Evil
race characters? I have seen it on a map of South Ro,
but haven't actually been out of Innuthule Swamp yet. My
wife did as her Troll, but hated playing it.
Another thing that worries me is that the Combine
Weapons sold by gypsies are not an option for a solo
player unless I get one at auction (which I am forced
into due to masive lag :( ) since they KOS me as well.
I enjoy the Troll, but need help to figure out a way
around these major milestones.
Any and all help is welcome.

--
Cronik
4ht Rank Troll SK
Bertoxxulous
